name: NEC LCD
tagline: NEC MultiSync LCD4610 command line interface
body:
# Description

Command line interface for RS-232 communication with the LCD screen NEC MultiSync LCD4610.


# Documentation

The communication protocol is described [here](http://www.necdisplay.com/documents/UserManuals/External_Control_LCD4x10.pdf).


# Installation

```
$ make
$ make install

Other useful commands:
$ make manifest - generate new MANIFEST
$ make dist     - pack all files in MANIFEST
$ make clean    - clean dir
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
